title: bArayya venkaTaramaNa
sahitya:
bArayya venkaTaramaNa bhaktara nidhiye


anupallavi

  tOrO ninnaya daya tOya jAmbakane


caraNam 1    vEda gOcara bArO Adi kaccapa bArO mOdasUkara bArO sadayA narasimha bArO
    caraNam 2    vAmana bhArgava bArO rAmakrSNane bArO prEmada buddhane bArO svAmi kalki nI bArO
    caraNam 3    aravinda nAbha bArO surara prabhuvE bArO puruhUta vandya bArO purandara viTTalla bArO
